title: Please Help ID this serif
content:
I know I have come across each of these faces many times but I can't put my finger on what they are or where I saw them. Any help? It would be much appreciated.

Cheers.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Fonts.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016032858/http:/typophile.com/files/Fonts_0.jpg) | 43.98 KB |
author: lathen.kamas

comments.content:
CHOP SHOP looks like Brother from Emigre.

- Mike Yanega

The 3D look is done just by layering, by the way. HONEST JOHN'S could be any sans with an oblong O.

- Mike Yanega

The Emigre font is [Brothers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016032858/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=83), with an 's'.

- Mike Yanega
Thanks! Yes, I knew about the layering effect. I'm only concerned with the base faces.
